column1: Daily Weather Observations for Albany, Western Australia for December 2024
Prepared at 13:02 UTC on Friday  8 August 2025   IDCJDW6001.202412
Most observations from a city site down near the harbour, but some from the airport.
The airport is approximately 11 kilometres inland and on some days can experience quite different evaporation and sunshine conditions from those in the city.
Temperature, humidity, wind, cloud and rainfall observations are from Albany {station 009500}
Pressure, evaporation and sunshine observations are from Albany Airport {station 009999}
